entry.title: Fresh Russian Strikes Leave Parts of Ukraine Without Power
entry.content: Moscow launched one of its most destructive attacks on Ukraineâ€™s critical infrastructure, escalating its campaign to leave the country without power as winter approaches.

entry.title: Russia Is Offering Extra Payments to Mobilized Troops
entry.content: Subsidies, intended to bolster families of men called up in the unpopular draft for the war in Ukraine, are rolling out unevenly and sparking criticism.
